availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County attorney and farmer. Kentucky native. Married Virginia C. Winfrey. Father of Jordon G. Winfrey, Crocket C. Winfrey, Francis H. Winfrey, Ella K. Winfrey, Joseph R. Winfrey, and Thomas S. Winfrey.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 338. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Burksville, District 1, p. 72. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Third Congressional District, Cumberland County, 1864. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Columbia, p. 26. “Thomas Columbus Winfrey,” Find A Grave, June 12, 2011, memorial no. 71204510. “Virginia Saufley Winfrey,” Find A Grave, August 7, 2011, memorial no. 74551936
